description: React functional component for a visitor check-in kiosk front-end page, handling multi-step interactions with backend API including OCR upload, voice recording, and form input. Implements a step-by-step dialogue flow for visitor check-in process.

classes.name: CheckinStepProps
classes.description: TypeScript interface defining the properties for each check-in prompt component

classes.name: KioskCheckinStep
classes.description: React functional component for a single step in the visitor check-in process, supporting text and voice input, OCR, and ID image upload

methods.name: startRecording
methods.description: Initiates voice recording using MediaRecorder, uploads audio to STT backend, and sets transcript

methods.name: uploadAudioForSTT
methods.description: Uploads recorded audio Blob to backend speech-to-text API, returns transcribed text

methods.name: handleCheckinStep
methods.description: Handles a check-in step by sending user input to backend and updating conversation state

methods.name: backendCheckinStep
methods.description: Performs API call to backend to process current step with user input and conversation state

methods.name: uploadOCRForID
methods.description: Uploads ID image file to backend OCR API and retrieves extracted data

methods.name: finalizeCheckin
methods.description: Sends final check-in data to backend to complete process and get confirmation
